title: Man, 76, remanded over 'drug-laced sweets' at summer camp
analysis:
Main Headline: Man Remanded Over Drug-Laced Sweets at Camp

Key Points:
A man has been remanded over drug-laced sweets at a camp.
The man, who is described as an elderly man, was found with the sweets on his person.
There are concerns about the potential harm the sweets may cause.

Summary: An elderly man has been remanded over drug-laced sweets at a camp. The sweets are a concern due to the potential harm they may cause. The man is now facing legal consequences for this incident.
